source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenery shot. The video features a time-lapse of dramatic, dark storm clouds. These clouds churn and swirl across the sky, with a visible rain shaft moving across the distant landscape.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenery shot. The video features a time-lapse of dramatic, dark storm clouds. These clouds churn and swirl across the sky, with a visible rain shaft moving across the distant landscape.

generated_critique: The caption should mention that a flock of birds flies rapidly across the sky during the time-lapse, as this is an important motion detail that helps convey the dynamic nature of the scene.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This is a scenery shot. The video features a time-lapse of dramatic, dark storm clouds churning and swirling across the sky, with a visible rain shaft moving across the distant landscape. A flock of birds flies rapidly across the sky, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene.
